shouldMatch: Migrate Ehcache Spring Cache annotations to Azure Cache for Redis
Adapts Spring Cache annotations (@Cacheable, @CacheEvict, etc.) to work with Redis
Spring Cache annotations for Ehcache migration
How to migrate @Cacheable, @CachePut, @CacheEvict, @CacheConfig, and @Caching annotations from Ehcache to Azure Cache for Redis
Spring Cache annotations are cache-implementation agnostic and can remain unchanged when migrating from Ehcache to Redis
